def_en: Reconciliation between two people or countries who have quarrelled is the process of their becoming friends again. A reconciliation is an instance of this.

def_cn: （两种貌似对立的信仰、事实或要求的）和谐，调和，一致
def_en: The reconciliation of two beliefs, facts, or demands that seem to be opposed is the process of finding a way in which they can both be true or both be successful.
